# serval_app_instance (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "serval_app_instance" "example_app_instance" {
  access_requests_enabled = true
  custom_service_id = "customServiceId"
  default_access_policy_id = "defaultAccessPolicyId"
  instance_id = "instanceId"
  name = "name"
  service = "service"
  team_id = "teamId"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This resource supports the following arguments:

- `access_requests_enabled` (Optional) Whether access requests are enabled for the app instance.
- `default_access_policy_id` (Optional) The default access policy for the app instance.
- `instance_id` (Optional) The instance ID of the app instance.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the app instance.
- `service` (Optional) The service of the app instance.
- `team_id` (Optional) The ID of the team.

## Attribute Reference

This resource exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the app instance.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
$ terraform import serval_app_instance.example '<id>'
```
